ratings.comment: This fossil should quit teaching---he's clearly lost his drive.  Lecture is completely useless, don't even bother going, and this comes from a student who NEVER skips.

Just took the first midterm (that he wrote even though he only taught a couple of lectures), and it was ridiculous. The class average was a 45%. Totally unlike any sort of practice exam or homework problem, a lot of it material we hadn't covered.

I thought the reviews would be proved wrong. But I was the one who was wrong. DO NOT GO TO LECTURE!! He is OLD and just has lost the drive to teach. This seems to be reflected in the Physics dept as a whole. The ONLY plus side to this professor is that he is better than Pondrom.  Again like I said, SKIP LECTURE

prepare to teach yourself! for the 3 lectures i went to, he seemed like an alright speaker but was very slow and just read his slides.. the homework probs are pretty good and the book is aright.. multiple choice tests & he tries to trick u - not cool.. my TA was a slacker too :( ..best advice: make a good eqtn sheet and know how to use it

The only physics 202/208 professor that I know who gives multiple choice exams so take him if you're lazy to write. However, each question is worth 5 marks so you can lose quite a lot, but the class is curved so it's not too bad. Lectures are very bad though

I'm sure he's a brilliant physicist, but he's TOO OLD. He can barely stand up for the whole lecture, and he spends about half the time repeating the same thing because he can't remember if he told us the past seven times.  If this is the best UW Madison's physics department can find, it is a sad day for Chamberlain and Sterling indeed.

Lectures are boring and not worth attending.  He does speak very slow and doesnt pay much attention to detail.  The homework is pretty decent, but one of the exams was murder.  He does have a pretty sweet curve though, so this class, tho it may not feel like, it is an easy B

Worst prof. ever! Lectures put you to sleep and he talks so slow and will then forget what he was trying to say and just move on without clarifying anything. Uses clicker system in lecture and even when 90% of the class gets the wrong answer, he doesnt take the time to explain the correct solution but instead fumbles his way through lecture.

His hw is good and helpful for learning the material but at a certain point in the year the hw is on stuff they dont teach for a few days. His lectures are pointless, never have I had someone put me to sleep so fast with 3 cups of coffee in me.  His TAs dont respect him, dont expect to learn anything from him. Go to disc if you want to be taught.

Typical week in the life of one of Don's victims: Monday: Homework due, long night trying to teach self out of book Tuesday: Discussion TA tries to teach what was mentioned in lecture last Thursday Wednesday: Lab, manual written very poorly Thursday: Don talks about what was on the homework finally Next Monday: You fail a multiple choice exam!
This man makes me cry.

Nice guy, but I must agree- he's a slow talker and he tends to dwell on things that aren't important.  His tests are a lot harder than the problems in the book, and although the questions are pretty straightforward, I found them to be much more challenging than I could have ever imagined.  Quite unimpressed by this particular professor.

Just plain awful.  I'd say about a fourth of his class came to his pointless lectures.  He goes through his lecture slides REALLY fast, but dwells on unimportant stuff.  His multiple choice tests were impossible.  DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASS!  HORRIBLE TEACHER!
The only reason I went to lecture was for the entertaining demonstrations. Really annoying how slow he talks. He isnt excited about things anymore and should retire

Worst. Professor. Ever.   Lectures from powerpoint slides, and gives multiple choice tests with no opportunity for partial credit. Assigns homework on this that he hasn't lectured on, and like to throw equations at you with little to no explanation.
The man is entertaining.  The fact that the class was so easy made up for him being a horribly pathetic professor..
Ummmmm... the... man.... is.... boring..... and.... he.... talks.... really... slowwwww
so boring

Man, this fossil should have quit years ago; he's very clear but it does not matter when 3/4 of the class is sound asleep.  He's def. better than Dasu (the other guy who he teaches with) but then again, who isn't? Drink a lot of Mountain Dew b4 lectur
Quite tiring to pay attention.  He does, though, explain the equations they throw at us instead of just assuming we get where they come from.  Not so good.
Quite possibly the most boring professor on campus.
